[Home](./index.md) &gt; [eth-connect](./eth-connect.md) &gt; [BigNumber](./eth-connect.bignumber.md) &gt; [dividedToIntegerBy](./eth-connect.bignumber.dividedtointegerby.md)

## BigNumber.dividedToIntegerBy() method

Returns a BigNumber whose value is the integer part of dividing the value of this BigNumber by `n`<!-- -->.

```ts
x = new BigNumber(5)
y = new BigNumber(3)
x.dividedToIntegerBy(y)              // '1'
x.dividedToIntegerBy(0.7)            // '7'
x.dividedToIntegerBy('0.f', 16)      // '5'
```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dividedToIntegerBy(n: BigNumber.Value, base?: number): BigNumber;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | [BigNumber.Value](./eth-connect.bignumber.value.md) | A numeric value. |
|  base | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The base of n. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[BigNumber](./eth-connect.bignumber.md)
